issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Sometimes, not sure how exactly to reproduce it, Studio would crash and not reopen.

In order to fix it I tried:

- Deleting the Library/Saved Application State/com.appcelerator.studio (or whatever that folder is called): it worked once.
- Re-installing Appcelerator Studio from scratch: utterly frustrating, I can't reinstall every day the software. 

How can this be fixed?
fields.summary: The Gestalt selector gestaltSystemVersion is returning 10.9.4 instead of 10.10.4. Use NSProcessInfo's operatingSystemVersion property to get correct system version number.

comments.body: Hello, What version of studio you are installing? Try downloading the latest studio from [here|https://web.appcelerator.com/product/studio]. Also please provide more information on your platform, cli, SDK, Node version. if there is error message when studio crashes. Thanks.
